userSignup.subject: Welcome to Share Settle!
userSignup.text: Welcome {userName} to Share Settle! We're thrilled to have you on board. Start managing your expenses and settle up with friends effortlessly.

groupCreation.subject: New Group Created on Share Settle
groupCreation.text: A new group '{groupName}' has been created on Share Settle. Start sharing expenses and settling up with your group members.

settlementNotification.subject: Settlement on Share Settle
settlementNotification.text: A settlement has been initiated for the group '{groupName}'. Log in to Share Settle to view and settle your expenses.

settlement.subject: Settlement Status
settlement.text:
Dear {user1} and {user2},

We're writing to inform you that the settlement between you two on Share Settle has been {status}.
Amount: {amount}
Date: {date}

Next Steps:
Please log in to Share Settle to see the changes. If you encounter any issues, please contact our support team for assistance.
Thank you for using Share Settle!
Sincerely,
The Share Settle Team

settlementReminder.subject: Reminder for Auto Settlement on Share Settle
settlementReminder.text:
Dear {user1},

We hope this message finds you well. This is a friendly reminder regarding the upcoming automatic settlement on Share Settle.

**Settlement Details:**
 Date: {date}

**Upcoming Settlement:**
A scheduled settlement for the group {groupName} is approaching. Share Settle will automatically calculate and settle the outstanding expenses among the members in 2 days.

**What to Expect:**
- The settlement process will be initiated automatically.
- You will receive a summary of the settled amounts and details.

**Next Steps:**
- Log in to your Share Settle account to review the settlement details.
- If you have any questions or concerns, please contact our support team.

Thank you for using Share Settle to manage your expenses effortlessly.

Best regards,
The Share Settle Team
